GET/api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of selected user

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/articles.description: receives and inserts a new article into the articles table returning a copy of the new article
POST /api/articles.special notes: article_img_url is optional and will default if not provided

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an individual article as specified by the URL

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increases the given article id's votecount as per the body provided in the request and returns an updated article
